sub_title: Managing Director at Verbruggen Palletizing Solutions
summary:
I am an active entrepreneur, and over the years I established various companies and businesses in different countries over the world. My main focus is in our family business in The Netherlands being the Verbruggen Group of companies.

A special example is that over the years I gained a lot of experience in Bangladesh through our self established entity Deltadesh, and I believe to be your one-stop-shop to any type of setup you want to start in Bangladesh. I am also very honored and privileged to have been assigned as a honory consul to Bangladesh in The Netherlands.

I am passionate about opportunities, where my main focus lies on enabling opportunity for the less privileged in the world.
